entries.content: Overcome the fear of upsetting or challenging the prospect; this fear prevents asking necessary questions.
There is nothing you cannot ask a prospect if you know how to ask the question correctly.
entries.notes: Emphasizes the importance of delivery and framing when asking potentially challenging or clarifying questions.

entries.content: When challenging a prospect or asking probing questions, avoid doing so in an awkward or clunky way that would cause upset.
entries.notes: Highlights that challenging/probing requires skill in delivery to be effective for discovery, not alienating.

focus_area: Objection Discovery: Clarifying questions, isolation, root cause
